name: The Ladypreneur Conference 2016
content: YOU ARE INVITED TO THE MOST AWAITED BUSINESS EVENT OF THE YEAR Join our business experts at THE LADYPRENEUR CONFERENCE 2016 and learn the secrets of building your business, make more money and create a better lifestyle. Be a part of this exciting event which will change the way you do business. THE LADYPRENEUR CONFERENCE 2016 is an event designed to provide women business owners with information, contacts and strategies to help them grow their businesses. THE LADYPRENEUR CONFERENCE 2016 will make you believe in your own magic! Imagine entering a new world of possibilities for your business within just one day! Here are just a few of the things you'll learn and experience: Mastering Your Business for Maximum PROFIT & SUCCESS! Tips, tricks, tools and cool hacks to manage your family and business simultaneously. How to fall in love with sales & build your business without COLD CALLING! The Million Dollar Circle to finding clients & maximizing client retention! How to grow an extremely profitable business. Determining what makes you UNIQUE in your industry! How to maximize profit from each sale and stop dropping your price! How to write powerful client attracting marketing materials! Key SECRET to building a million dollar business in 12 – 24 months! Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Social Media Marketing positioning yourself as an EXPERT By attending this event, you will walk away with: Contacts & Connections Influential contacts and connections – people who could change your career forever. Innovative Ideas Innovative ideas for your business – the kind that fast track your results. Solutions Solutions for problems and challenges – that you didn’t even realize were holding you back. Tools & Resources The latest tools and resources to leverage your strengths and magnify & multiply your outcomes. This event will be the premier business conference of 2016\. Attendees will also have time to network and establish strategic partnerships. A Weekend morning of Ideas and a year of grand success!
